channel.title: Comments on: A New Door Opens
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Mark Freeman
item.dc:creator: Mark Freeman
item.description: Jes, I am very happy for you. Perhaps you can bring karaoke to your new employer and their clients as well!
item.content:encoded: Jes, I am very happy for you. Perhaps you can bring karaoke to your new employer and their clients as well!

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
Congrats!

^ apparently is a duplicate of another comment (how dare that person!) so I am writing this pointless sentence to go with the above elated praise.

item.title: By: Hossam Alfraih (@SaudiGeekNET)
item.dc:creator: Hossam Alfraih (@SaudiGeekNET)
item.content:encoded:
Congratulation Jes!
This is really nice and hope it will motivate more people to give more to the community.
Wish you all the best in your new job.
Looking forward to see you soon in an online event!

item.title: By: Jennifer McConnell
item.dc:creator: Jennifer McConnell
item.description: Congratulations Jes; sounds like a great opportunity for you! Best of luck in the new position! :)
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Jes; sounds like a great opportunity for you! Best of luck in the new position! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Don Kolenda
item.dc:creator: Don Kolenda
item.description: This is awesome news, Jes! I just got around to reading it now. I'm so happy for you! Best of luck to you in the future. I'm expecting even bigger things from you now.
item.content:encoded: This is awesome news, Jes! I just got around to reading it now. I’m so happy for you! Best of luck to you in the future. I’m expecting even bigger things from you now.

item.title: By: Mark Elliott
item.dc:creator: Mark Elliott
item.content:encoded:
NNNnnoooooo!!!!!! They are competitors, don’t go there! Kidding. They are a great group and know you will fit in there well Jes. Plus you will be joining the marketing game. Warning:You will not want to do anything else from now on. It is very fun. Best wishes.

Mark

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: Atta grrrl! You won't even have to relocate ;)
item.content:encoded: Atta grrrl! You won’t even have to relocate ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Brent Ozar
item.dc:creator: Brent Ozar
item.description: Congratulations! I'm so happy for you. It's such a great feeling knowing that this stuff is finally paying off and you're getting pursued for your own worth. LOVE IT!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! I’m so happy for you. It’s such a great feeling knowing that this stuff is finally paying off and you’re getting pursued for your own worth. LOVE IT!
